body:
thor: let me go
loki, still holds on thor's leg tightly: no
thor: loki..
loki: i hate u
thor: then let me go
loki: no
thor: lemme go to bathroom please
loki: ᶦ ʰᵃᵗᵉ ᵘ

blog.name: marvelxfangirl
blog.title: Marvel Fangirl
blog.description:
Hello! I’m Rose, 16 and I absolutely love Marvel very very much! Send me asks and what not so we can freal out and fan over Marvel together. 
THIS IS A SIDE BLOG, you can follow me at Fangirlxrose

body:
Happy New Years!!

Happy New Year’s Eve everyone!!

Thank you all so much for making this year a great one, I’m ending the year with over 11 thousand friends, not followers but friends. Every single one of you is amazing and thank you for liking the stuff I post, thank you for messaging me to freak out over things or to just talk and thank you for just everything.

I hope 2019 brings good things to you all!!!

Love from your Marvel fangirl, Rose❤️

summary:
#Marvel #CaptainMarvel #Avengers #BrieLarson #JudeLaw #КапитанМарвел

Сайт «Капитана Марвел» подтвердил, что Джуд Лоу играет...
caption:
#Marvel #CaptainMarvel #Avengers #BrieLarson #JudeLaw #КапитанМарвел

Сайт «Капитана Марвел» подтвердил, что Джуд Лоу играет Мар-Велла.

Роль Джуда Лоу в боевике нашей любимой киновселенной «Капитан Марвел» держится в строжайшей тайне. Настолько строгой, что даже с детей Лоу, приходивших к нему на съёмочную площадку, строгие люди из Disney взяли строгую подписку о неразглашении. Если, конечно, актёр не шутит. Но как знать…

По официальной версии его героя зовут Йон-Рогг и он лидер команды «Старфорс», в составе которой бывшая землянка Кэрол Дэнверс (Бри Ларсон) активно борется за спасение вселенной от инопланетной расы Скруллов. Однако сегодня на официальном сайте картины появился кадр из фильма с подписью «Джуд Лоу в роли Мар-Велла, лидера „Старфорс“».

Сайт «Капитана Марвел» подтвердил, что Джуд Лоу играет Мар-Велла
Так подтвердилось, что Лоу является не кем иным, как героем по имени Мар-Велл — бойцом из расы «доблестных воинов-героев» Крии и наставником Капитана Марвел. Правда, информацию эту быстро потёрли, и теперь на подписи к фото значится скромное «Лидер „Старфорс“».

Но ребятам из Marvel уже никого не обдурить. С момента назначения Лоу на роль, несмотря ни на какую секретность, все только и говорили, что он играет Мар-Велла, а сейчас пути назад нет и подавно.

Фильм Анны Боден и Райана Флека по сценарию Мэг Лефов («Головоломка») и Николь Перлман («Стражи галактики») выходит 8 марта 2019 года. kg-portal.ru
https://www.instagram.com/p/BsD3EgZFNUQ/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=g4g5le8u5iu3

blog.name: my-world-my-ocs
blog.title: OCs Land
blog.description:
Particular Sign : Autistic ( Asperger Syndrome)

Hobbies: Read (Books,Comics and whatever thing it's Literature),Draw (Always POKEMONS and other things i lke),Color, Go on the Internet ad Write (Mostly stories about my OCs)

Music : Almost anything, i don't have preference

Movies, Books, Cartoons, Anime TV Shows, Games : I know a LOT, so you can just call me a SUPER NERD

Other Social Media : 
Deviantart --> Pokemon - fnaf
Fanfiction.net --->KoopalingsPokemon Love 

Little Info : 
- Too many OCS, Which are 54 Females 27 Males 2 Asexual 2 Non Gender = 85 in Total (There like my Childs)

- Obessed with Rainbow colors and the Philosofy of the 7 SOULS (Undertale)
Determination,Bravery,Justice,Kindness,Patience,Integrity,Perseverance

- Wide Imagination

- Always getting obsessed with something for a certain time period (Which is why i create so many OCs ),Until i pass to something else but i stay loyal forever
to the pasts obsessions no matter what (So i have A WIDE store of Fandoms)

summary: This story it's about my Super Powered OCs, more specifically Patricia. It's about an incident she had (a really bad one you'll...
caption:
This story it’s about my Super Powered OCs, more specifically Patricia. It’s about an incident she had (a really bad one you’ll see in the comic) and how her friends helped her going through this tough time. So this Comic can tagged as a Hurt / Comfort / Friendship type of story.  

Characters in the Cover: 

JULLY (the blonde girl on the bottom left) 

SAMANTA (girl with green jacket on the bottom right) 

PATRICIA (in the middle) 

MAXIMUS (the guy at Patricia right) 

CLETUS (the other guy at Patricia left)

CAT (girl half blonde, half red, smiling with fingers pointing) 

EDDIE AND PATRICK (the two big dudes at the right. Eddie is the blonde one, Patrick the red one) 

WILD (girl with black hair with smug face at Maximus left) 

SAVAGE (the black big guy right beside Wild)

Please comment what you think about this. Thank you. <3

FRONT PAGE

blog.name: lawfulgoodness
blog.title: LawfulGoodness
blog.description: Mostly just RPGs and comic books.  Not a "fandom" blog, unless D&D alignment charts count as a fandom. Nice people doing good things is my aesthetic. I also follow fitness blogs for my fitblr, @runnerdrun.

summary: So I just had a lovely conversation with two coworkers over movies, our favorites, and what we enjoy about movies.  It was funny...
body:
So I just had a lovely conversation with two coworkers over movies, our favorites, and what we enjoy about movies.  It was funny because the convo started with one coworker talking about how the movie “Hackers” was the greatest film of all time, and another coworker calling it an unwatchable mess.  We all argued and laughed and talked about film, Citizen Kane, Stanley Kubrick, and the movies we watched this past weekend (Spider-Man: Into the Spiderverse, Aquaman, & Venom).  

At the end we all made fun of each other, ourselves, and the movies we love.  We decided to go on a road trip next week to check out some things in Kansas City.

I get back to my desk and find people in my notes calling me obscenities and then blocking me for failing to sufficiently praise their favorite comic book movie(s).

Why are people on tumblr so divorced from reality? What is it about fandom that inspires verbal abuse and misanthropy?  Why is it so hard to treat people online like actual people?

I get back to my desk and find people in my notes calling me obscenities and then blocking me for failing to sufficiently praise their favorite comic book movie(s).

summary: @hottoyscollectibles just released this teaser of the upcoming #CaptainMarvel #HotToys 1/6 scale collectible figure!! I’ve spent...
caption:
@hottoyscollectibles just released this teaser of the upcoming #CaptainMarvel #HotToys 1/6 scale collectible figure!! I’ve spent so many months working on this costume from concept design to working with the costume designer @sanjahays , her costume department & Film Illusions… & to see how accurate Hot Toys has made this… WOW! They’re so amazing! I can’t wait to get my hands on this toy #hottoys #onesixthscale #collectibles #marvel #marvelstudios @brielarson
https://www.instagram.com/p/BsD2Lu8jiKP/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=zvfdoywvuev

blog.name: call-us-wrath
blog.title: An Overly Affectionate Alien And Her Anxious Host
blog.description:
This blog is for my symbiote OC, Wrath, and her host, Claire Jones.

I will be posting doodles, fun facts, and other stuff for these two. You can also ask them questions!

Ask Box: Open!

Made some fanart? Tag us!

body:
Happy New Year!

Claire: Happy new year to everyone!

Wrath: What do you think 2019 is gonna be like?

Claire: I don’t know, but it’s definitely gonna be a lot more fun with you around.

Wrath: Aw, thanks!

reblog.comment:
Happy New Year!

Claire: Happy new year to everyone!

Wrath: What do you think 2019 is gonna be like?

Claire: I don’t know, but it’s definitely gonna be a lot more fun with you around.

Wrath: Aw, thanks!

trail.content_raw:
Happy New Year!

Claire: Happy new year to everyone!

Wrath: What do you think 2019 is gonna be like?

Claire: I don’t know, but it’s definitely gonna be a lot more fun with you around.

Wrath: Aw, thanks!
trail.content:
Happy New Year!

Claire: Happy new year to everyone!

Wrath: What do you think 2019 is gonna be like?

Claire: I don’t know, but it’s definitely gonna be a lot more fun with you around.

Wrath: Aw, thanks!

title: heaven's not too far away
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GLJzG4

by tempestaurora

May Parker had died two weeks before.

And now MJ’s Aasimir Ranger was dead on the ground, in the middle of D&D combat. In Peter’s mind he could see her, the Morningstar embedded in her stomach, wings lifeless, bow and arrow at her side, forgotten.

For a moment, the image was replaced with May. Corpse strewn across the road, the car speeding off into the distance; blood running down from her nose, eyes unseeing, staring into the sky above. He wondered what her last thought had been.

Peter blinked and it was Finn again. A Dungeons and Dragons character. MJ. Not May.

OR Peter moves on, somehow.

Words: 7561, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 9 of wayward sons

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Harley Keener, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Harley Keener, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Pepper Potts, Peter Parker & May Parker, Harley Keener & Tony Stark, Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition, Teen for language, Hurt/Comfort, a little fluff, Recovery


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GLJzG4

blog.name: odinson-barnes
blog.title: Thor Odinson
blog.description:
Ask Box is always open! 🌻🌻 |MasterList

⚡️“ᴵ ᴬᴹ ᴹᴵᴳᴴᵀᵞ” ⚡️

I’m just a Teenager who likes to write.

body:
I Missed This

Warnings: Fluff!!

You stood in the kitchen with some music playing in the background with a glass of wine off to the side as you cooked Chris’ favorite meal. You thought it would be the least you could do since he’s been gone for 8 months.

Chris would come home for your birthday and you both would face time a lot, but he was finally coming from shooting his new movie and he said he was taking a break for a while to spend time with you.

As you took a sip of your wine and danced along to the song that played from the living room not hearing the door open as your fiance walked through the door.

When Chris heard the music and he could smell the food you were cooking a grin immediately stretched across his face. He loved moments like this one in your guys’ house, it made him feel at home and he swore he fell in love with you even more.

Placing your glass of wine next to the bottle, you took the food out of the oven smiling when it smelled delicious and turned around to see Chris standing there in the door of the kitchen with a smile on his face.

“Chris!” You shouted as you turned off the oven and quickly ran to jump into his arms.

“Hey sweetheart.” He smiled as he caught you easily; his arms wrapping around your waist as you hugged him tight. “I’ve missed you.” He said into your neck as he left small kisses.

“I’ve missed you too. Especially that accent of yours.” You teased as you lifted his chin so you both could share a kiss.

The kiss was soft and gentle as you wach had missed the other dearly as your hands slipped into his hair, knocking the hat off his head.

When Chris put you down, you broke the kiss before leading him over to the food. “I made you favorite. Thought we could do a little celebrating tonight.” You laughed.

Chris nodded. “I think that’s a wonderful idea.” He smiled as he grabbed a glass from one of the cabinets and poured himself some wine.

After you plated the food, you both sat down and ate together. The conversatons were filled with Chris explaining his filming adventures, and some of the interviews he did. You would tell him of you tried keeping the house tidy and would go out with friends as well as keeping your job being a Veterinarian going.

Dinner soon was over and both of you sat on the couch with a glass of wine in your hands as you were snuggled up against his side. “I missed this.” He said suddenly, breaking the silence that had consumed you.

“I did too.” You whispered. “It’s not the same without you around.” You said softly.

“I know.” He replied just as soft. “I wish I didn’t had to be away for so long but it’s apart of my job.” He said. 

“I know.” You repeated. “I understand and you’re doing what you do best. I just want to be supportive.”

“And you are. Everything you do is amazing, going with me doesn’t always mean your supportive, but being here for when I come home, it lightens up the entire time I’ve been gone because I know I have something to look foreword to.” He smiled.

You couldn’t help the smile that spread across your face as you kissed his lips. “God I love you.” You smiled.

“I love you too.” He said as his lips met yours as you sat on his lap. “Should we take this somewhere else?” He teased.

You chuckled as you nodded. “Let’s ditch the wine and say hello to the bedroom.” You said as you placed your glass and his on the table before he picked you up and led you to your room; where you shared a night you’d never forget.

Tags: @philosophical-sorrows-official @hymnofthevalkyrie @caplansteverogers @ketchavies-thoorrrr666 @constantcraicdreamss @queen-maximoff @widowbite-legit @sleepypanda27 @fuckthatfeeling @stansworth @imagines-galoreee @spacezombiie @evans-against-the-wall @britishspidey @actuallyivar @witchymarvelspacecase @superspideyparker @tremistqueen @pieceofsupersoldiertrash @mrshicks38

The kiss was soft and gentle as you wach had missed the other dearly as your hands slipped into his hair, knocking the hat off his head.

When Chris put you down, you broke the kiss before leading him over to the food. “I made you favorite. Thought we could do a little celebrating tonight.” You laughed.

Chris nodded. “I think that’s a wonderful idea.” He smiled as he grabbed a glass from one of the cabinets and poured himself some wine.

After you plated the food, you both sat down and ate together. The conversatons were filled with Chris explaining his filming adventures, and some of the interviews he did. You would tell him of you tried keeping the house tidy and would go out with friends as well as keeping your job being a Veterinarian going.

Dinner soon was over and both of you sat on the couch with a glass of wine in your hands as you were snuggled up against his side. “I missed this.” He said suddenly, breaking the silence that had consumed you.

“I did too.” You whispered. “It’s not the same without you around.” You said softly.

“I know.” He replied just as soft. “I wish I didn’t had to be away for so long but it’s apart of my job.” He said. 

“I know.” You repeated. “I understand and you’re doing what you do best. I just want to be supportive.”

“And you are. Everything you do is amazing, going with me doesn’t always mean your supportive, but being here for when I come home, it lightens up the entire time I’ve been gone because I know I have something to look foreword to.” He smiled.

You couldn’t help the smile that spread across your face as you kissed his lips. “God I love you.” You smiled.

“I love you too.” He said as his lips met yours as you sat on his lap. “Should we take this somewhere else?” He teased.

You chuckled as you nodded. “Let’s ditch the wine and say hello to the bedroom.” You said as you placed your glass and his on the table before he picked you up and led you to your room; where you shared a night you’d never forget.

I Missed This

Warnings: Fluff!!

You stood in the kitchen with some music playing in the background with a glass of wine off to the side as you cooked Chris’ favorite meal. You thought it would be the least you could do since he’s been gone for 8 months.

Chris would come home for your birthday and you both would face time a lot, but he was finally coming from shooting his new movie and he said he was taking a break for a while to spend time with you.

As you took a sip of your wine and danced along to the song that played from the living room not hearing the door open as your fiance walked through the door.

When Chris heard the music and he could smell the food you were cooking a grin immediately stretched across his face. He loved moments like this one in your guys’ house, it made him feel at home and he swore he fell in love with you even more.

Placing your glass of wine next to the bottle, you took the food out of the oven smiling when it smelled delicious and turned around to see Chris standing there in the door of the kitchen with a smile on his face.

“Chris!” You shouted as you turned off the oven and quickly ran to jump into his arms.

“Hey sweetheart.” He smiled as he caught you easily; his arms wrapping around your waist as you hugged him tight. “I’ve missed you.” He said into your neck as he left small kisses.
